description: Yamada Ryuu is a delinquent second-year student who doesn`t seem to care much for school, and is failing academically. One day he trips on the stairs and accidentally kisses Shiraishi Urara, who is his opposite in almost every way, and through her mysterious powers winds up swapping bodies with her. It is later found out that he has the ability to copy the powers of whomever he kisses.
name: Yamada Ryuu
